author: Onejohi

comments.comment: Good tool for testing is PostMan.

description: Walk through on how to set up a Restful API using Node.

quotes.quote: The reason they’re called static files is because they are not changed by the server nor run, they’re merely sent back as files for your browser to parse through.
REST stands for REpresentational State Transfer.

title: Building a simple REST API with NodeJS and Express.
